sources.title: If I Were King (1938)
sources.description: King Louis XI masquerades as a commoner in Paris, seeking out the treachery he is sure lurks in his kingdom. At a local tavern, he overhears the brash poet François Villon extolling why he would be a better king. Annoyed yet intrigued, the King bestows on Villon the title of Grand Constable. Soon Villon begins work and falls for a lovely lady-in-waiting, but then must flee execution when the King turns on him. Watch on RetroFlix:  https://retroflix.org/if-i-were-king-1938/

metadata.Plot: In 1463, Paris is besieged by the Duke of Burgundy, arch-rival of the king, who is content to sit tight while the poor starve. But there are traitors in Paris, and King Louis goes undercover to find one, thereby meeting Francois Villon, poet, philosopher and rogue. By chance Villon kills the king's traitor and is ordered to replace him...as Grand Constable of France! But there's a catch...
metadata.Writer: Preston Sturges, Justin Huntly McCarthy, Lou Smith
metadata.Actors: Ronald Colman, Basil Rathbone, Frances Dee
